*  The Central Bank has permitted Axis Bank Ltd. and ICICI Bank Ltd. to 
close  down  their  business  operations  in  Sri  Lanka,  subject  to  certain 
conditions,  at  the  request  of  their  parent  banks.  Accordingly,  these 
two  banks  are  currently  not  permitted  to  carry  on  banking  business, 
including  accepting  deposits  from  the  general  public.  The  licenses 
issued to these banks will be cancelled once the winding-up operations 
are completed.
